name: SIGNAL GENERATOR ETC
description:
You are the recently hired captain of the Modular Autonomous Rover System (MARS) program, and your job is to make sure that the rover works well for exploring moons and other celestial objects.

The rover is programmed through the use of modules, almost like a modular synthesizer, which are plugged together with cables in order to create more complex pieces of logic.

Note on Web Browsers

Firefox, for some reason, has significant audio latency. Chrome does not seem to have this problem. Downloading is definitely the best option (although Mac & Linux are untested).
